name: Noggle Statue - Angst
description: A small wobbly statue of Stalker's Acolyte, Angst.

languages.description: Eine kleine Wackelfigur vom Akolythen des Stalkers, Angst.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Angst

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante d'Angoisse, une des disciples du Stalker.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Angoisse

languages.description: Una statuetta del discepolo dello Stalker, Angst, con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Angst

languages.description: 스토커의 어콜라이트, 앵스트의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 앵스트

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de uno de los discípulos de Stalker, Angustia.
languages.name: Esttatua Tambaleante - Angustia

languages.description: 一小座追猎者追随者焦虑摇头娃娃
languages.name: 焦虑摇头娃娃

languages.description: Stalkerの従者のボブルヘッド人形、Angst。
languages.name: Angst ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała, chwiejna figurka akolity Stalkera: Obawa.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Obawa

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada de um discípulo do Stalker, Angústia.
languages.name: Estatueta: Angústia

languages.description: 一小座 Stalker 的追隨者－焦慮的搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: 焦慮搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยกขนาดเล็กของผู้ช่วยเหลือ Stalker - Angst
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Angst

languages.description: Stalker Acolyte, Angst küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Angst

languages.description: Статуетка прибічника Сталкера на ім’я Тривога.
languages.name: Ноґл «Тривога»
